mapper.insert: insert into bom_material(bom_code ,bom_num, mat_code, proc_code, prod_code, bom_mat_count) values(#{bomCode},#{bomNum}, #{matCode}, #{procCode}, #{prodCode}, #{bomMatCount})
mapper.select: select bom.bom_code, bom.bom_num, bom.mat_code, bom.prod_code, bom.proc_code, bom.bom_mat_count, m.mat_name, p.prod_name from bom_material bom join material m on bom.mat_code = m.mat_code join product p on bom.prod_code = p.prod_code where bom.prod_code = #{prodCode}
